name: Torriden Cellmazing Brightening Ampoule
description: Torriden Cellmazing Brightening Ampoule is an intensive vitamin C treatment developed to refine enlarged pores, smooth uneven texture, and target visible dark spots. Formulated with stabilised pure vitamin C, multiple vitamin C derivatives, niacinamide, ferulic acid, and a seaweed complex, it works to brighten skin tone while supporting long-term clarity.

name: Torriden Cellmazing Firming Cream
description: Torriden Cellmazing Firming Cream is a nourishing facial moisturiser formulated for dry and mature skin concerns. Designed to improve visible firmness and reduce the appearance of fine lines and enlarged pores, the cream delivers targeted care through Torriden’s proprietary 5D Collagen Complex, peptides, and an amino acid blend. NMF components and ten molecular weights of hyaluronic acid help maintain long-lasting hydration, while niacinamide supports smoother texture and a clearer-looking complexion. The lightweight cream melts into skin for comfortable daily wear.

name: Torriden Cellmazing Firming Eye Cream
description: Torriden Cellmazing Firming Eye Cream is a targeted anti-ageing treatment designed to revitalise the delicate eye area and address visible fine lines, wrinkles, and dark circles. The formula combines Torriden’s proprietary 5D Collagen Complex with an advanced retinol delivery system to support firmer, smoother-looking skin.

name: Torriden Cellmazing Firming Gel Mask
description: Torriden Cellmazing Firming Gel Mask is a targeted anti-wrinkle treatment designed to deliver visible firming and hydration to both face and neck. The three-piece embossed gel format contours seamlessly to the skin, helping active ingredients absorb effectively for comprehensive coverage.

name: Torriden Dive In Cleansing Foam
description: Torriden Dive In Cleansing Foam is a gentle, award-winning facial cleanser formulated to thoroughly remove dirt, sunscreen, and makeup residue while keeping skin hydrated and comfortable. Suitable for all skin types, including dry and sensitive skin, it produces soft, cushiony bubbles that cleanse without irritation.

name: Torriden Dive In Cleansing Water
description: Torriden Dive In Cleansing Water is an award-winning Korean micellar cleanser formulated to gently dissolve oil- and water-based impurities while maintaining skin comfort. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and acne-prone skin, it removes dirt, sunscreen, sebum, and light makeup without irritation.

name: Torriden Dive In Cream
description: Torriden Dive In Cream is a soothing daily moisturiser developed to provide deep, long-lasting hydration with a fresh, dewy finish. Powered by a 5D-Complex of low-molecular-weight hyaluronic acid, the formula penetrates effectively to relieve internal dryness and replenish moisture at multiple levels of the skin.

name: Torriden Dive In Mask
description: Torriden Dive In Mask is an award-winning moisture-rich sheet mask designed to deliver intensive hydration in a single treatment. Infused with five types of hyaluronic acid, it helps replenish moisture at different levels of the skin while supporting elasticity and smoothness.

name: Torriden Dive In Mild Sun Cream SPF50+ PA++++
description: Torriden Dive In Mild Sun Cream is an award-winning physical sunscreen formulated with SPF50+ PA++++ protection to suit sensitive and easily reactive skin types. The 100% zinc oxide base forms a protective barrier on the skin to reflect UV rays while maintaining a lightweight, breathable feel.

name: Torriden Dive In Moisture Sun Cream SPF 50+ PA++++
description: Torriden Dive In Moisture Sun Cream is a hydrating chemical sunscreen formulated to deliver broad-spectrum SPF 50+ PA++++ protection while maintaining skin comfort throughout the day. Its lightweight, non-greasy texture blends seamlessly without leaving a white cast, making it suitable for daily use.

name: Torriden Dive In Serum
description: Torriden Dive In Serum is a highly regarded Korean hydrating treatment formulated to replenish moisture and soothe dehydrated, tight skin. Powered by a 5D low-molecular-weight hyaluronic acid complex, it penetrates efficiently to hydrate multiple skin layers while supporting long-lasting moisture retention.

name: Torriden Dive In Skin Booster
description: Torriden Dive In Skin Booster is an essence-like facial toner formulated to deeply hydrate, refresh, and balance oil and moisture levels after cleansing. Infused with five molecular sizes of hyaluronic acid, it delivers layered hydration for a naturally plump, dewy complexion.

name: Torriden Dive In Soothing Cream
description: Torriden Dive In Soothing Cream is a refreshing gel moisturiser formulated for oily, combination, and dehydrated skin types. Powered by Torriden’s advanced 5D multi-low-molecular hyaluronic acid system, it replenishes moisture deeply while maintaining a lightweight, breathable feel.

name: Torriden Dive In Toner
description: Torriden Dive In Toner is a viral, award-winning hydrating toner formulated to replenish moisture, soften texture, and soothe post-cleansing sensitivity.

name: Torriden Solid In Lip Essence
description: Torriden Solid In Lip Essence is a beauty award-winning Korean lip treatment formulated to deeply moisturise, nourish, and strengthen very dry and sensitive lips. Using Torriden’s SOLID IN technology and a 5D Ceramide Complex, the essence delivers moisture deep into the skin while reinforcing the lip barrier to help prevent dryness and chapping.

name: MARS Drip Lip Mist
description: MARS DRIP LIP TINT delivers a juicy, syrup-like finish with vibrant, long-lasting color. Inspired by ripened fruits, it offers rich shades of reds, pinks, and browns, perfect for everyday wear or bold glam. Its versatile formula allows you to effortlessly customize your look, whether you prefer a soft tint or a bold pop of color.

name: MARS Makeup Remover Wipes
description: MARS Makeup Removing Wipes effortlessly melt away even the most stubborn full-coverage makeup, leaving your skin soft, clean, and hydrated. Each pack contains 30 nourishing wipes, designed to meet the unique needs of Indian skin.

name: MARS Matte On Compact Powder
description: MARS Wonder Powder 2-in-1 Compact Powder gives a high-definition finish with medium to full coverage. It controls oil and sweat, lasts long, and feels softer than a marshmallow!

name: MARS Microfiber Velvet Beauty Sponge
description: MARS Microfiber Velvet Beauty Blend is designed with ultra-soft, microfiber material that effortlessly blends and buffs makeup for a flawless, airbrushed finish. It has made from microfiber, a synthetic material known for its softness, absorbency, and ability to blend makeup seamlessly. Microfiber beauty blender often have a velvety texture that feels smooth and luxurious on the skin. This texture helps to distribute and blend liquid and cream products evenly without streaking. They are durable and resistant to wear and tear, providing long-lasting use without needing frequent replacement. They are easy to clean with mild soap and water or a gentle makeup brush cleanser.

name: MARS Mr. Remover Micellar Water
description: Meet MARS Mr. Remover, the ultimate oil-based makeup remover. Specially formulated to effortlessly dissolve even the most stubborn waterproof makeup, it keeps your skin hydrated, soft, and refreshed. This versatile remover also gently unclogs pores and exfoliates, revealing a radiant and rejuvenated complexion. Ideal for all skin types, MARS Mr. Remover guarantees a flawless clean every time.

name: MARS Non Transfer Butter Stick Lipstick
description: MARS Non-transfer butter lipstick is a Matte Lipstick that will steal your heart with the smoothest glide on your lips, it’s non-sticky, non-transfer and water-proof formula which settles into a complete matte finish. It has one swipe pigmentation and lasts up to 12 hours. Available in 24 rich shades that compliments every mood.

name: MARS Northern Light Liquid Eyeshadow
description: MARS Northern Lights Liquid Eyeshadow takes you to a different dimension and brings all your magical dreams into reality. This multi-chrome eyeshadow will enchant you with its divine & fierce pigment and makes sure that your eyes shine brighter than Kohinoor.

name: MARS Oh Brow Eyebrow Pencil
description: Get set brow! The MARS Oh Brow Eyebrow Pencil comes in a dual ended design with a fine tip pencil on one side to give you the most precise strokes and a spoolie brush on the other to comb and define the brows for a flawless arch. Key Features: Precise Definition, Seamless Blend, Long-lasting Results, Convenient Spoolie.

name: MARS Plush Velvet Lipstick
description: Indulge in the luxury of MARS Plush Velvet Lipstick. Rich, creamy and smooth like silk, it gives you a soft matte finish with a light, comfortable feel. Available in 24 stunning shades, it is made to match every mood and every occasion.

name: Mars Popstar Non Transfer Smudge Proof Long Lasting Matte Liquid Lipstick
description: MARS Popstar Liquid Mousse Lipstick gives you a bright pout that will let you outshine the camera flashes. This liquid lipstick which is completely matte, smudge proof and transfer proof has 24 stunning shades to choose from.

name: MARS Pore Cure Primer
description: MARS Pore Cure Primer is a pore-filling primer that smooths and mattifies your skin to create the perfect base for foundation. It helps control oil throughout the day and works well on all skin types.

name: MARS Professional Brush Set
description: The MARS Pro Brush Set is made with care and made to be perfect. These brushes help you put on makeup flawlessly. Each brush is great for different things like blending and contouring. They work so well that it's like having a professional makeup artist right at your fingertips. Use these brushes to bring out your creativity and make amazing looks with ease. You definitely need this collection!

name: MARS Sky Liner Matte Eyeliner
description: MARS Skyliner Liquid Matte Eyeliner for Women delivers precise application with long-lasting, water-resistant, smudge-proof, and transfer-proof wear up to 12 hours. Features matte finish in 4.5ml Black shade—perfect for bold, all-day eye looks.

name: MARS Smooth Glide Wont Budge Wont Smudge Kajal
description: Be bold with MARS Smooth Glide Kajal. The new highly-pigmented colours are smudge-proof, water-proof and have an easy-glide formula. They are the perfect partners to make your life dramatic.

name: MARS Sugar Rush Liquid Blush
description: MARS Sugar Rush is a highly pigmented liquid blush that delivers a long-lasting, flattering flush of color with a dewy matte finish. Its lightweight formula effortlessly blends into the skin, giving you a smooth, radiant glow that lasts all day.

name: MARS Superstay Lipstick - 01 Bloom
description: MARS Super Stay Lipstick, a revolutionary formula designed for those who crave bold, long-lasting color without compromising comfort. Our single glide formula offers intense pigmentation that stays vibrant for up to 12 hours, ensuring your lips look flawless all day. Available in 24 stunning shades, this lipstick delivers a smooth matte finish while keeping your lips hydrated and comfortable.

name: MARS Vanity Box
description: MARS Vanity Makeup Bag with Built-in Mirror | Multi-Level Expandable Organizer with Bottom Drawer | Durable Synthetic Rexine | Water-Resistant | Portable Cosmetic Case

name: MARS Wont Budge Wont Smudge Kajal
description: MARS Won’t Smudge Won’t Budge Kajal is a Twist Up Kajal which is enriched with Chamomile and Ceramide. It just simply won’t smudge neither would it budge. It has Jet Black Pigmentation, glides on smoothly on the lower line, stays put for 24 hours, is smudgeproof and budgeproof, and comes in retractable packaging.

name: MARS Wont Budge Wont Smudge Lip Crayon
description: Unlock beauty that stays with you all day with the MARS Won’t Smudge, Won’t Budge Lip Crayon. This matte-finish masterpiece comes in 24 shades to match every personality and mood. Designed for style, comfort and confidence, it is your go-to for effortless glam that lasts.

name: MARS Zero Primer
description: This hydrating, lightweight, and non-sticky silicone-based primer effortlessly blurs imperfections and smooths uneven skin texture. The ultra-smoothing formula controls excess oil, minimizes pores, and reduces the appearance of fine lines for a flawless makeup base.

name: MARS TRIO Treat
description: Get glammed up with a quick and effortless eye look with the MARS TRIO Treat, A must-have for stunning eyes in just three simple steps. This compact kit combines eyeliner, mascara, and eyeshadow for a complete eye transformation, perfect for any occasion.

name: Nasher Miles Capri Hard-Sided Polypropylene Cabin Luggage with Laptop Compartment 20 inch
description: Carry-On Small (S): With a compact 20-inch size, this carry-on suitcase is ideal for travel duration ranging from 1 to 5 days, making it the perfect companion for weekend getaways, business trips, or quick vacations. Despite its sturdy build, the luggage remains lightweight, ensuring easy portability while holding up to 8 kg of weight. Quick-Access Front Compartment: Stay organized on the go with the innovative front-opening compartment, designed for quick and convenient access to your laptop, tablet, travel documents, and chargers. The padded sleeve securely fits laptops up to 15.6 inches, while the premium lining adds a touch of elegance and extra protection for your essentials. For added convenience, the front panel opens fully, providing direct access to the main compartment without the need to unzip the entire bag. Anti-Theft Zipper: Equipped with advanced anti-theft zipper technology, this suitcase provides enhanced security by resisting forced entry—offering far greater protection than conventional zippers and ensuring your belongings always remain safe. Built-In TSA Lock: Travel with confidence thanks to the integrated TSA lock, designed to keep your suitcase securely locked while allowing only authorized airport security personnel to inspect your luggage without causing damage. This feature ensures your belongings stay safe and intact throughout your journey, whether you're flying domestically or internationally. Durable & Effortless Mobility: Crafted from unbreakable, impact-resistant polypropylene, this trolley bag is built to endure the rigors of frequent travel without adding extra weight. Designed for seamless mobility, it features eight 360-degree spinner wheels and a premium aluminum telescopic handle deliver smooth maneuverability and comfortable handling on every journey—whether navigating crowded airports, busy train stations, or uneven hotel surfaces. Warranty: 5 years warranty on shell & 1 year warranty on accessories. Wear & tear for products under use and scratches are not covered.

description: Occupation-Inspired Luggage: Colorful luggage featuring occupations like astronauts and pilots ignites kids' creativity. Ideal for family trips, sleepovers, and school outings. Designed for kids aged 3 to 12, it is a perfect fit for young adventurers. Premium Polycarbonate for Durability: Our luggage is crafted from premium polycarbonate material, ensuring it stands up to the bumps and tumbles of travel. Let your child's luggage withstand the test of time and keep up with their active lifestyle. Roomy Storage with Smart Organization: Featuring two spacious compartments, there's plenty of room for toys, clothing, and other travel essentials. The elastic straps inside help secure your child's clothing, keeping everything in place and minimizing wrinkles. Lightweight and Flexible Maneuverability: Our kids' carry-on suitcase is designed to be lightweight, making it easy for children to manage on their own. Equipped with eight spinner wheels, the suitcase effortlessly rotates 360 degrees, providing flexibility and smooth movement. It won't be an extra burden – it's a joy to pull and navigate. 12 Months Warranty: We offer a 12-month limited warranty. It covers the repair or replacement of any defective material or component. name: Nasher Miles Tic Tac Toe Polycarbonate Hard-Sided Cabin Luggage for Kids Sky Blue 44|17inch Kids Trolley Bag |Occupation Pilot
description: Occupation-Inspired Luggage: Colorful luggage featuring occupations like astronauts and pilots ignites kids' creativity. Ideal for family trips, sleepovers, and school outings. Designed for kids aged 3 to 12, it is a perfect fit for young adventurers. Premium Polycarbonate for Durability: Our luggage is crafted from premium polycarbonate material, ensuring it stands up to the bumps and tumbles of travel. Let your child's luggage withstand the test of time and keep up with their active lifestyle. Roomy Storage with Smart Organization: Featuring two spacious compartments, there's plenty of room for toys, clothing, and other travel essentials. The elastic straps inside help secure your child's clothing, keeping everything in place and minimizing wrinkles. Lightweight and Flexible Maneuverability: Our kids' carry-on suitcase is designed to be lightweight, making it easy for children to manage on their own. Equipped with eight spinner wheels, the suitcase effortlessly rotates 360 degrees, providing flexibility and smooth movement. It won't be an extra burden – it's a joy to pull and navigate.
